name: Remember This!
description:
Remember This

This cute 2D minigame mimics gameplay from Pokemon Stadium's Clefairy Says! All you have to do is repeat the directions the teacher puts on the board. If you're a good enough student, you'll win!

Github Link:

Click the link below to find the project files on GitHub.

Github project link

Credits

Lose sound effect: 'Jingle_Lose_01.wav' by LittleRobotSoundFactory from freesound.org (here)

Chalkboard tap: 'tap_on_chalkboard.wav' by joedeshon from freesound.org (here)

Correct movement sound: '320655__rhodesmas__level-up-01.mp3' by shinephoenixstormcrow from freesound.org (here)
